attributes.action: Allow the ownership of handguns, including licenced concealed carry.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current UK legislative dispensation effectively allows only criminals to own and carry weapons. Where concealed carry has been allowed for law-abiding citizens in the United States it has DECREASED the incidence of violent crime. The reason? Criminals are cowards and the possibility that their intended victim may be armed causes criminal behavior to diminish.
